title: the lag since 6.6
body:
hello everyone, 
i have lag since patch 6.6, i sent ticket for riot, but they blamed my internet as always, 
alright if my internet is bad , why there is alot of ppl who suffering exactly like me!!
why there is alot of ppl who have the same problem , just after this patch!!
why other games have not the same problem ?!
why just league of legends!!
i cant play LOL now , pls fix the problems....
my pleasure.

replies.body:
Keep in mind that when we release patches (such as patch 6.6), this doesn't affect your connection to the individual game servers.  While the patch affects in-game content, it doesn't have any affect on your connection path to our servers.  While there seems to be strong correlation between the patch and your lag, this does not seem to be the root cause at all.  Additionally, we do constantly monitor patches to see if there is any drastic increases in ping for players across the whole server, and we have not found any such issue.  If the patch itself was at fault, then every single player would be experiencing the same issue since everyone is on the same patch.  Since this is not the case, we need to look elsewhere for a root cause.

The Specialist in your ticket should have been able to look over logs regarding your internet connection.  However, you can check the health of your connection to our game servers yourself by using our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It should let you know some steps you can take to improve it as well.

I hope this helps!
